T02TD1238E:113b-24: aom lim l'im h'u% h'u% phat /
T02TD1238E:113b-25: aom aem aeem h'u% h'u% phat /
T02TD1238E:113b-26: aom aom aoom h'u% h'u% phat /
T02TD1238E:113b-28: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1238E:113b-29: 'dir dz'a landha ri pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:113b-30: gal te goo r'i ma la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags bzla bar bya ba de'i tshe de la 'khyud par bya ste bcom ldan 'das ma yang de'i gdan la bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:113b-31: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1238E:113b-32: aom badzra goo r'i ye h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1238E:113b-33: aom badzra tsoo r'i ye h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1238E:113b-34: aom badzra bett'a l'i ye h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1238E:113b-35: aom badzra ghasma r'i ye h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1238E:113b-36: aom badzra pukka s'i ye h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1238E:113b-37: aom badzra sha wa r'i ye h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1238E:113b-38: aom badzra tsa nda l'i ye h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1238E:113b-39: aom badzra dombi n'i ye h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1238E:113b-41: da ni gtor ma'i de kho na nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1238E:113b-42: stong pa nyid du mos pas lhan cig skyes pa'i he ru ka'i rnam par bsgoms nas sngar bshad pa'i rim pas sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i khro bo'i dbang po zhal brgyad pa la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen po zhe sdang rdo rjer rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:114a-0: de ltar rnal 'byor pa zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas bzhin du aom yig las byung ba'i khro bo bcu po 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa thams cad phyung nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa bkye ste dbang po la sogs pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs @114a * //
T02TD1238E:114a-1: rnams bkug nas aom sumbha ni sumbha zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bka' bsgo ste zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dbye bas so //
T02TD1238E:114a-2: de'i rjes su glang po'i snod yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje dang /
T02TD1238E:114a-3: sa'i snod yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje dril bu yang bsam par bya ste de ltar gzhan rnams kyi yang sbyang bar bya /
T02TD1238E:114a-4: de ltar rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i blo bzang gis 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma gsum steng nas steng du ste yi ge gsum las rdzogs pa'i thar pa'i grong khyer gsum bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:114a-5: de rnams nyid kyis bkug pa'i bgegs rnams /
T02TD1238E:114a-6: aom aandi dza ma dz'a la dzakka bhu ta bahni b'a au rakkha tsanda sudzdza m'a da babpa ta la p'a t'a lam aatta sa sappa sv'a h'a /
T02TD1238E:114a-7: zhes pa'i sngags kyis sa bon nas dgug pa la sogs par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:114a-8: aom badzra goo r'i a'ak'arsha ya dza:aom badzra tsoo r'i padma tra ye pra be sha ya h'u%/
T02TD1238E:114a-9: aom badzra be t'a l'i sva sva sth'a ne shu kro dha bandhe na bandha ye /
T02TD1238E:114a-10: aom badzra ghashma r'i sham ghand'a ya wa sham ku ru ho:zhes byas nas blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1238E:114a-11: de la bar gyi grong du shar gyi 'dab ma la dbang po lag na rdo rje zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1238E:114a-12: lhor gshin rje lag na dbyug pa ste nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114a-13: nub tu chu lha sa ku mu da dang zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od can rgyan thams cad 'chang ba'o //
T02TD1238E:114a-14: byang du gnod sbyin te lag na shr'i pha la dang zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od can rgyan thams cad 'chang ba'o //
T02TD1238E:114a-15: dbang ldan gyi 'dab ma la 'byung po'i bdag po mig gsum pa /
T02TD1238E:114a-16: lag pa na rtse gsum dang stag gi pags pa'i gos 'chang ba thal bas sre bor gyur pa'i lus rus pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114a-17: me'i 'dab ma la me lha gsus pa che ba bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02TD1238E:114a-18: nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can bla gos bgos pa'o //
T02TD1238E:114a-19: bden bral gyi 'dab mar srin po shang lang dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1238E:114a-20: khro zhing smin ma 'khyog po dang ldan pa ro'i steng du nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114a-21: rlung gi 'dab mar rlung lha lag na rgyal mtshan dang rgyan thams cad 'chang ba zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114b-0: @114b padma'i ze'u 'bru la sa'i lha mo ser mo lha'i gos dang rgyan thams cad 'chang ba lag na bum pa ste zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od can yi dags rnams kyang sa'i lha mo la kun nas bskor te gnas pa'o //
T02TD1238E:114b-1: dbang po la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par gzhan ni srung ba'i 'khor lor bshad pa de 'dir rtogs par bya la /
T02TD1238E:114b-2: 'dir gang bshad pa de yang 'dir shes par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:114b-3: dbang po la sogs pa lnga rnams kyis g-yon pas sbrul zhags 'dzin pa /
T02TD1238E:114b-4: slar thams cad g-yas brkyang pa'i zhabs kyis gnas par bsams nas h'um yig gis mi bskyod pa'i rnam par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1238E:114b-5: steng du chos 'byung du gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad po rnams su shar gyi 'dab ma zla ba dkar po rta dkar po la zhon pa lag na ku mu da ste rgyan thams cad 'chang ba zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114b-6: lho'i 'dab ma la nyi ma dmar po phyag dag gis padma 'dzin pa rta ljang gu la zhon pa rin po che'i cod pan can rgyan thams cad kun nas rdzogs pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114b-7: nye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir zla ba dang nyi ma dag gis lhag pa la sogs pa bzung ngo //
T02TD1238E:114b-8: nub kyi 'dab ma la lhag pa ser po byi ba ser po la zhon pa nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can lag na mda' ste rin po che'i cod pan can no //
T02TD1238E:114b-9: byang gi 'dab ma la pa ba sangs sngon po rim po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD1238E:114b-10: mdung 'dzin pa nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114b-11: dbang ldan gyi 'dab ma la bkra shis dmar po skra gyen du grol ba padma 'dzin pa nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114b-12: me'i 'dab ma la phur bu shin tu ser ba rin po che'i cod pan can be con 'dzin pa nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114b-13: bden bral gyi 'dab ma la spen pa nag po skra ser skya rtse gsum 'dzin pa nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:114b-14: rlung gi 'dab ma la sgra gcan dang mjug rings te cher gnag pa dang du ba'i mdog 'khor zhing 'khor bas bkug nas za ba'i rnam pa can gyi lag pa nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02TD1238E:115a-0: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ze'u 'bru'i dbus su tshangs pa ser po gdong bzhi pa lag pa bzhi pa dbyug gu gsum 'dzin pa dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag / phyag lhag ma dag gis phreng ba dang @115a * //
T02TD1238E:115a-1: spyi blugs 'dzin pa la zhon pa zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od can mchod phyir thogs dang ldan pa thung zhing lus rgyas pa ral pa can te tshangs ris dang tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang tshangs chen la sogs pa nas 'og min gyi mthar thug pa rnams kyis tshangs pa la kun du bskor nas gnas par rnam par bsams nas aom yig gis sku rdo rje'i rnam par rdzogs par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1238E:115a-2: de'i rjes su 'og tu chos 'byung du gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad po rnams su phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi rim pas te de la /
T02TD1238E:115a-5: klu stobs kyi rgyu dmar po //
T02TD1238E:115a-8: klu padma chen po sngo bsangs /
T02TD1238E:115a-11: brgyad po 'di rnams kyang rin po che'i cod pan can mi'i gdong can rgyan thams cad 'dzin pa mgo bor gdengs ka sa brgyan pa lha ma yin dang dmyal ba'i sems can dang bcas pa de'i ze'u 'bru la yang klu lhag ma dkar po rin po che'i cod pan can mi'i gdong pa la gdengs ka dang ldan pa ste de rnams 'di ltar brtan par byas nas a'a:yig yongs su gyur pa las gsung rdo rje'i rnam par blta bar bya zhing dpal he ru ka'i gzugs kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1238E:115a-12: yang na las thams cad pa'i don du phyag dang zhal dang sku mdog la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1238E:115a-13: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las la bdag nyid gzugs ji lta ba de bzhin du de rnams kyi bya'o //
T02TD1238E:115a-14: de ltar kun du bsams nas sku dang thugs dang gsung rdo rje dpal he ru ka'i gzugs thob pa rnams la mchod yon la sogs pa dbul bar bya ste de la ku sha'i chun pos mgo bo la bsang gtor dang /
T02TD1238E:115a-15: phyag rgyas zhabs la zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD1238E:115a-16: lag pa g-yon par gnas pa'i dung lag pa g-yas pas bkab nas zhal du 'thor 'thung dang /
T02TD1238E:115a-17: phyag rgyas mgo bo la mchod yon te lan gsum du'o //
T02TD1238E:115a-18: aom pra wa ra satk'a ra dang /
T02TD1238E:115a-19: pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a'i bar du aargham la sogs pa bcug ste 'di dang de rnams kyis thams cad phul nas /
T02TD1238E:115a-20: ai dam ba lim bhunydza dzidgha phulla duppa m'am sa pim gha aambha k'adzdza s'appa s'a dha khanti khu ni phe da g'a da /
T02TD1238E:115b-1: / phyed snga mas bza' ba'i zhal zas dang /
T02TD1238E:115b-2: phyed phyi mas ni bya ba yang ngo //
T02TD1238E:115b-3: de'i rjes su rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i sngags pas pad kor la sogs pa'i rnam pas thog ma nyid du rdo rje gsor zhing gnas brgyad rnams su dril bu gsil ba byas nas man ngag gis bdud rtsir byas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:115b-4: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'a m'a dya nutpanna tvata a'a:h'u% phat sv'a h'a zhes brjod de 'di nyid kyis kun du tshim par yang byas nas thun mtshams su snyan pa'i glu yang blang bar bya zhing rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bstod nas yi ge brgya ba brjod do //
T02TD1238E:115b-5: de la glu ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1238E:115b-6: koolla ai retthi aa bo l'a /
T02TD1238E:115b-8: gha na kri pi ta ho badzdza ai /
T02TD1238E:115b-9: k'a ru nye ki aa ai na ro l'a /
T02TD1238E:115b-10: ta him ba la kh'adzdza ai /
T02TD1238E:115b-11: g'a dhe ma aa n'a pidzdza ai /
T02TD1238E:115b-12: ha le k'a linydza ra p'a ni aa ai /
T02TD1238E:115b-14: tsa au sa ma k'asth'u ri /
T02TD1238E:115b-15: sihla k'appu ra l'a ai a'a ai /
T02TD1238E:115b-16: m'a la aindha na sh'a lim dza /
T02TD1238E:115b-17: ta him bha ru kh'a ai aa aom /
T02TD1238E:115b-18: phrem kha na khe ta ka rante /
T02TD1238E:115b-19: suddha aa suddha na mu ni aa ai /
T02TD1238E:115b-20: ni ram su aangge tsa d'a bi aa ai /
T02TD1238E:115b-21: ta him dza sa r'a ba p'a ni aa ai /
T02TD1238E:115b-22: ma la aa dza kundu ru batta ai /
T02TD1238E:115b-23: drindi ma ta him na b'adzdza aa a'i //
T02TD1238E:115b-24: de la rtsa ba'i sngags ni 'di ni te /
T02TD1238E:115b-27: de la yi ge brgya ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te aom shr'i he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02TD1238E:115b-28: he ru ka tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha wa /
T02TD1238E:115b-29: su to shyo me bha wa /
T02TD1238E:115b-30: su po shyo me bha wa /
T02TD1238E:115b-31: aa nu rakto me bha wa /
T02TD1238E:115b-33: sarba karmma su tsa me tsi ttam shre ya:ku ru h'u% ha ha ha ha ho:bha ga w'ana sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa he ru ko bha wa ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva a'a:h'u% phat de'i rjes su bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa byas nas rjes su brtse bas 'dod pa'i don gyi gsol ba btab ste gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1238E:115b-34: de la bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02TD1238E:115b-35: lha mo tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang //
T02TD1238E:115b-36: des gsungs dag kyang tshad ma'i mchog yin te //
T02TD1238E:115b-37: bden pa 'di yis lha mo de dag rnams //
T02TD1238E:115b-38: bdag la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur 'gyur shog / bdag la rjes su brtse ba ni //
T02TD1238E:115b-39: mgon po kun rtog chags bcom srid zhi mnyam la chags //
T02TD1238E:116a-0: dngos kun ngo bo nyid kyi @116a * //
T02TD1238E:116a-2: shin tu lci ba'i snying rje'i chus brlan rgyas pa'i thugs //
T02TD1238E:116a-3: lha mo rnams kyis bdag la rjes brtser mdzod cig mdzod /
T02TD1238E:116a-5: aom badzra mu: aom a'a: h'u% phat phat phat ces pa 'di rnams kyi aom yig gis smon lam mo //
T02TD1238E:116a-7: h'u% yig gis tshim par byed pa'o //
T02TD1238E:116a-8: phat yig gsum gyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116a-9: rnal 'byor pa rnams dge slong gtor ma 'dis //
T02TD1238E:116a-10: gal te 'byung po thams cad mchod byed pa //
T02TD1238E:116a-11: de tshe de rnams dri med bder 'gyur te //
T02TD1238E:116a-12: 'gro ba rnams su 'byor dang lha yang dga' //
T02TD1238E:116a-13: dbang dang mngon spyod dgra sde 'jig pa dang //
T02TD1238E:116a-14: bskrad pa dang ni gsad dang dgug pa dang //
T02TD1238E:116a-15: zhi rgyas bde ba 'di rnams don du ni //
T02TD1238E:116a-16: 'byung po'i tshogs la rtag tu gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1238E:116a-18: las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1238E:116a-19: de nas 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa'i sngags pa'i lte ba dang /
T02TD1238E:116a-21: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang /
T02TD1238E:116a-22: dpral bar yang go rims bzhin du /
T02TD1238E:116a-23: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02TD1238E:116a-25: de bzhin du bcu drug dang /
T02TD1238E:116a-26: sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i padma bzhi po bsams nas lte bar sa bon bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116a-27: gtum mo'i gzugs mar me'i rtse mo lta bur 'bar bas chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams dang spyan ma la sogs pa yang bsregs nas a'a li dang k'a li dag 'byung ba dang rngub pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dang bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang rnam par dag pa'i gzugs can ham yig kyang bsregs pa las /
T02TD1238E:116a-28: de nas bde ba chen po'i rgyur gyur pa'i byang chub sems blangs te bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu de ltar ro gcig tu byas nas slar zla ba dang nyi ma dang thod pa yang bzung nas snying ga'i sa bon la rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116a-29: n'a da dang bcas pa'i 'bar ba'i sa bon de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid du gyur pa ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:116a-30: thig le rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:116a-31: zla phyed rnam par snang mdzad 'dod //
T02TD1238E:116b-0: @116b re kh'a rin chan bdag po nyid //
T02TD1238E:116b-1: nye yig gis ni 'od dpag med //
T02TD1238E:116b-2: au yig don yod grub par yang //
T02TD1238E:116b-3: shes nas rgyal ba lnga bdag nyid //
T02TD1238E:116b-5: slar yang n'a da mar me'i rtse mo lta bur phyung ste phrag dog gi rang bzhin can au yig ni chags pa'i rang bzhin can ha yig la'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-6: de'i rjes su ha yig ni ser sna'i bdag nyid can re kh'a la'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-7: de nas re kh'a yang gti mug gi rang bzhin can zla ba phyed pa la'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-8: zla ba phyed pa yang zhe sdang gi rang bzhin can thig le la ste /
T02TD1238E:116b-9: thig le yang n'a da la bsdu bar bya zhing /
T02TD1238E:116b-10: n'a da yang phra mo'i rtse mor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-11: 'dis sems brtan par gyur pa na lhun gyis grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa dang /
T02TD1238E:116b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang rgyas par mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byed pa spro bar bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-14: 'di nyid dz'a landha ri ba'i zhabs kyis sbas pas gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:116b-15: 'di nyid las bzhengs nas chos kyi dbus su sna tshogs padma yang bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-16: de'i 'dab ma brgyad rnams su brgyad po rnams kyi dbang phyug kyang ste de'i thugs kar sa bon bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-17: sa bon las n'a da'i rtse mor mthar bsgom par bya zhing sems brtan par byed pa'i don du rtse mo phra ba'i mthar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-18: de yis lhan cig tu 'byung bas sems brtan par 'gyur ba la the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-19: sems brtan pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i dra ba yang shin tu rgyas par mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byed pa spro bar bya ste gang las na /
T02TD1238E:116b-20: rang gi mtshan ma las spro ba ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mgon po dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid can zhes so //
T02TD1238E:116b-21: chos kyi sgras don rnam pa gnyis bstan te man ngag gi lta ba las khong du chud par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-22: mtshan ma yang nyungs kar sbom po tsam du bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba phra mo'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:116b-23: 'di nyid las bzhengs pa las gal te rnal 'byor pa phyag gnyis pa kye rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis go cha gnyis byas nas gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:117a-0: de la 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa ni mgo bor @117a * //
T02TD1238E:117a-2: lha'i rna rgyan gyi rnam pas 'od dpag med ni rna ba dag la hr'i'o //
T02TD1238E:117a-3: mgul gyi phreng ba'i rnam pas rin chen dbang po ni mgrin par tr'am ngo //
T02TD1238E:117a-4: lag gdub kyi rnam pas rnam par snang mdzad ni lag pa dag la aom mo //
T02TD1238E:117a-5: ska rags kyi rnam pas don yod grub pa ni rked pa la kham ngo //
T02TD1238E:117a-6: thal ba'i rnam pas rdo rje sems dpa' ni yan lag thams cad la ham ste go cha bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:117a-7: mig dag la ni gti mug rdo rje ma ni aam ngo //
T02TD1238E:117a-8: rna ba dag la zhe sdang rdo rje ma ni a'am ngo //
T02TD1238E:117a-9: sna la ser sna rdo rje ma ni aim du bshad do //
T02TD1238E:117a-10: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma ni aum ngo //
T02TD1238E:117a-11: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma ni aam ngo //
T02TD1238E:117a-12: sems dpa' chen po go cha rnams kyis dbang po rnams kyi rnam par dag pa bya'o zhes pa ni dgod pa gnyis pa'o /
T02TD1238E:117a-14: // / de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma las bsgrubs pa 'dis lus la go cha gyon nas rnal 'byor pa seng ge bzhin du gnas par bya ste phyag gnyis pa'i kye rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis 'jig rten gsum gyi gzhal yas khang gi nang du'o //
T02TD1238E:117a-15: de ltar yang klu sgrub zhabs kyis //
T02TD1238E:117a-16: srid gsum ma yin 'di ni khang brtsegs srog chags ma yin 'di rnams rgyal ba'o //
T02TD1238E:117a-17: bdag ni mi min 'khor lo'i dbang po yul min la dbang po la sa sogs min //
T02TD1238E:117a-18: bdag nyid gzugs la sogs dang chos nyid kyang min de slad de rnams dkyil 'khor pa //
T02TD1238E:117a-19: sna tshogs 'di rnams dkyil 'khor 'khor lor bsdus phyir kye sems 'khrul par 'gyur ba ci //
T02TD1238E:117a-21: de'i rjes su gang cung zad rnyed pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba'am btung ba la sogs pa'i rdzas rnyed pa rnal 'byor pas sngar bzhin du sbyangs shing yi ge gsum gyis brlabs nas bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho gas bza' bar bya'o zhes pa bza' ba'o //
T02TD1238E:117a-22: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas gnas pa dang rgyu ba dag gis brjod par bya ste de ltar ni /
T02TD1238E:117a-23: brkam dang rgongs dang 'jigs dang khro /
T02TD1238E:117a-24: ngo tsha'i bya ba'ang rnam spang bya //
T02TD1238E:117a-25: bdag nyid gnyid ni spangs nas ni //
T02TD1238E:117a-26: the tshom med par spyod pa bya //
T02TD1238E:117a-27: 'di nyid lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni //
T02TD1238E:117a-28: phyi nas spyod pa kun du brtsam //
T02TD1238E:117b-0: skal dang skal med @117b rnam dpyad pas //
T02TD1238E:117b-1: de las sbyin dang sbyin bya min //
T02TD1238E:117b-2: bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba ni //
T02TD1238E:117b-3: ji ltar rnyed pa'ang bza' bar bya //
T02TD1238E:117b-5: 'dzin pa'i cha ni bya ba min //
T02TD1238E:117b-6: rigs lnga po ni mnyam sbyor bar //
T02TD1238E:117b-7: rigs gcig tu ni brtag par bya //
T02TD1238E:117b-8: rigs ni du ma nyid kyis ni //
T02TD1238E:117b-9: ji bzhin dbye ba bskyed bya min //
T02TD1238E:117b-10: shing gcig gam ni dur khrod dang //
T02TD1238E:117b-11: de bzhin mtshan mo ma mo'i khyim //
T02TD1238E:117b-12: yang na skye bo med pa dang //
T02TD1238E:117b-13: bas mthar bsgom pa dge bar brjod //
T02TD1238E:117b-14: gal te spyod pa byed 'dod na //
T02TD1238E:117b-15: drod ni cung zad thob pa na'o //
T02TD1238E:117b-17: 'dis ni spyod pa spyad par bya //
T02TD1238E:117b-19: spyod do zhes pa ni spyod pa dang kun du spyod pa'o //
T02TD1238E:117b-20: gnas pa'i tha snyad ni kun du spyod pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go /
T02TD1238E:117b-21: drod cung zad thob pa la ltos pa yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:117b-22: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyang mtshan mo rang gi gnas su shin tu spyod pa bya ste ji srid cung zad thob par gyur par ro //
T02TD1238E:117b-24: ji bzhin dbye ba bskyed bya min //
T02TD1238E:117b-27: mi bya ba ni rang dbang nyid de 'di ni spyod pa'o //
T02TD1238E:117b-28: de nas thun mtshams gzhan la nyal bar 'dod pas dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor la mngon du phyogs par byas nas seng ge bzhin du nyal bar bya'o zhes pa nyal ba'o //
T02TD1238E:117b-29: ldang ba'i dus su yang pukka s'i la sogs pa'i glus bskul ba las langs pa na sngar bshad pa'i rim nyid kyis mchod pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa nas spyod pa'i mthar thug pa thams cad thun gsum du bya ste ji srid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa mngon sum du byas pa las las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa sa brgyad kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing 'ong ba'o //
T02TD1238E:117b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:117b-31: ji srid bsgom la sbyor 'gyur ba ;
T02TD1238E:117b-32: / de srid dang po'i las can yin //
T02TD1238E:117b-33: dang po'i las kyi sbyor bas kyang //
T02TD1238E:117b-34: sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:117b-35: zhes pa slar yang langs pa'o //
T02TD1238E:117b-36: 'di rnams kyis ni sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mdo sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par bshad do //
T02TD1238E:117b-37: de la mdo gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
T02TD1238E:118a-2: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1238E:118a-7: stong pa nyid du mos pa dang /
T02TD1238E:118a-14: zhe sdang gi bdag nyid dang /
T02TD1238E:118a-25: gtor ma'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1238E:118a-33: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bri bar bya ste /
T02TD1238E:118a-34: chos kyi sgras don rnam pa gnyis bstan te man ngag ji lta ba las khong du chud par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa 'di'i don to //
T02TD1238E:118a-35: man ngag kyang 'di yin te bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis sems brtan par byed pa'i don du rdo rje'i bu gar mtshan ma nyungs kar sbom po tsam du rnam par bsams nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:118a-36: rim pa 'di nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa po zla ba dang nyi ma dang thob pa dang sa bon la sogs pa la mi ltos par skad cig gi rnam pas rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnam par rdzogs pa'i gzugs su rdzogs par byas nas chos las steng du sna'i rtse mor nyung kar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:118a-37: nyungs kar zhes pa ni srog rtsol gyi kun du rtog pa ste de yang nyin mtshan du rgyu ba'i rim pas khrig phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag bcu drug tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD1238E:118a-38: de bsgom pa rab kyi mthar thug pa'i rim pa de nyid kyis srog rtsol 'gog pa'i phyir gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas de'i rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bcas pa 'gog ste med par dgag pa'i 'jug pas so //
T02TD1238E:118a-39: de nas yang spro ba dang sdud pa'i sku rdo rje 'chang 'byung ba yin te 'di ni med par dgag pa dang ma yin par dgag pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1238E:118a-40: de dang 'dis kyang sa brgyad kyi dbang phyug nyid du rab tu grub bo //
T02TD1238E:118a-41: dz'a landha ri pa'i zhabs kyis de gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:118b-0: de'i rjes su lta ba @118b las steng du 'gro bar bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1238E:118b-1: ji ltar 'dod pas dmigs pa med par sna las rngub pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:118b-2: de bzhin kho nar dbyung ba na 'og tu dmigs pa med pa ji srid par ro //
T02TD1238E:118b-3: ji ltar 'dod pa'i sgra ni rtogs pa ste de lta bu'i man ngag ni shin tu sbas pa yin no zhes pa rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
T02TD1238E:118b-4: 'dis 'di gsungs pa yin te bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag gis lus dang ngag dang sems brdzun pa nyid du rtogs pa la brten nas stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems la 'jug go //
T02TD1238E:118b-5: des bdag byin gyis brlabs pa yang khong du chud par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:118b-6: kye rdo rjer yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:118b-7: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba /
T02TD1238E:118b-8: thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bgyi ba lags /
T02TD1238E:118b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1238E:118b-11: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pas kyang //
T02TD1238E:118b-12: zhes pa rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste rim pa gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1238E:118b-13: da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rtogs par bya ste de la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i thabs rtogs par byas pa las brdzun pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems ni bdag gi sgras mngon par brjod par bya ba yin la /
T02TD1238E:118b-14: de rnams kyi byin gyis brlab pa ni phan tshun so so ma yin pa'i rnam pas skyes pa'i lus la sogs pa dbyer med pa gang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku dmigs pa med pa'i bde ba'i khang pa khyad par dga' ba'i mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de ni bdag byin gyis brlab par brjod de longs spyod rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1238E:118b-15: ci ltar na de'i lus la sogs pa dbyer med pa yin zhe na /
T02TD1238E:118b-16: brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u bzhi par gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:118b-17: lus spangs nas ni gzhan du na //
T02TD1238E:118b-18: sems ni mdzes par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1238E:118b-19: sems spangs nas kyang gzhan du na //
T02TD1238E:118b-20: lus ni gnas pa mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:118b-22: lus kyi rnam pas sems dang /
T02TD1238E:119a-0: sems kyi rnam pas lus dang ngag tu brjod pas sems su khyed kyis @119a * //
T02TD1238E:119a-2: 'phags pa lha'i zhabs kyis kyang lam gyi snying po las gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:119a-3: gang zhig rang bdag nyid kyis 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:119a-5: gnyis med nyid las nges grol ba //
T02TD1238E:119a-6: bdag gi sgra yis mngon brjod bya //
T02TD1238E:119a-7: dz'a landha ri pa'i zhabs kyis kyang //
T02TD1238E:119a-8: rigs kyi le'u las phyung nas longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1238E:119a-9: lus la ye shes chen po gnas //
T02TD1238E:119a-10: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02TD1238E:119a-11: dngos po kun la khyab byed pa //
T02TD1238E:119a-12: lus la gnas kyang lus skyes min //
T02TD1238E:119a-13: le'u brgyad par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:119a-14: rang rig 'di ni ye shes te //
T02TD1238E:119a-15: ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul lo //
T02TD1238E:119a-16: 'dis ni byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir //
T02TD1238E:119a-17: kun mkhyen ye shes de rang bzhin //
T02TD1238E:119a-18: bdag byin gyis brlab pa nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa sna tshogs la ltos nas ming gzhan gyis gsungs te /
T02TD1238E:119a-20: de nyid rnam par shes pa'i tshul //
T02TD1238E:119a-21: skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang //
T02TD1238E:119a-22: bdag dang srog dang sems can dang //
T02TD1238E:119a-23: dus dang gang zag nyid dang yang //
T02TD1238E:119a-24: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di //
T02TD1238E:119a-25: sgyu ma'i gzugs can yang dag gnas //
T02TD1238E:119a-26: 'phags pa lang kar gshegs par yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:119a-27: gang zag rgyun dang phung po dang //
T02TD1238E:119a-28: rkyen dang rdul dang de bzhin du //
T02TD1238E:119a-29: gtso bo dbang phyug byed po rnams //
T02TD1238E:119a-30: sems tsam du ni nga smra'o //
T02TD1238E:119a-32: lus la ye shes chen po gnas //
T02TD1238E:119a-33: zhes pa ni lus ni 'dir sprul pa'o //
T02TD1238E:119a-34: lus de la gnas pa ste /
T02TD1238E:119a-35: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid ye shes ni lus la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1238E:119a-36: dmigs pa thams cad nye bar rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir de'i bden pa'i rnam pa ni 'di'o //
T02TD1238E:119a-37: de yongs su ma shes pa las phung po'i skye ba blangs pa yin te /
T02TD1238E:119a-38: ci'i phyir zhe na sngon dang sngon gyi bag chags kyi phung po 'gags nas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba las bag chags 'dzin /
T02TD1238E:119a-39: bar ma do'i srid pa'i gnyen po khyad par gyi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid kyi ye shes 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD1238E:119b-0: de nas shes rab dang @119b thabs kyi padma dang rdo rje yang dag par sbyor ba mthong nas 'dod pa nye bar len pa las skye ba ste 'dzin pa po med pa'i rang bzhin mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02TD1238E:119b-1: de nas gzung bar byas pas stong pa'i dga' ba yang ngo //
T02TD1238E:119b-5: de nas yang phung po lnga rnams dang po rnams dang yul rnams rim gyis 'byung ngo //
T02TD1238E:119b-6: de dpal kye rdo rje'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:119b-7: rdo rje snying pos 'di skad gsol zhing bshad de /
T02TD1238E:119b-8: kye bcom ldan 'das lus de la ye shes chen po rang bzhin gyis dag pa ci ltar na 'byung ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba lags /
T02TD1238E:119b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni bo la dang kakko la sbyor zhing reg pa las te dag cing gzod ma nyid nas rang bzhin med par 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma rnams la bde ba sbyin pas gsungs so //
T02TD1238E:119b-10: khrem gnyer med pa'i rang bzhin bdag / thams cad lus la rnam par gnas //
T02TD1238E:119b-11: kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po'i phung po lags /
T02TD1238E:119b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1238E:119b-13: bo la kakko la sbyar ba'i //
T02TD1238E:119b-14: reg pas sra ba'i chos kyis ni //
T02TD1238E:119b-15: sa ni de las skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:119b-16: byang sems chu yi rnam pa las //
T02TD1238E:119b-18: bskyed pa las ni drod skye ste //
T02TD1238E:119b-19: 'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags //
T02TD1238E:119b-20: bde bas nam mkha'i khams kyang ngo //
T02TD1238E:119b-21: lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD1238E:119b-22: de 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsungs te /
T02TD1238E:119b-23: 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las ;
T02TD1238E:119b-24: / kun du ru la lnga ru 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:119b-25: dga' ba chen po'i gcig nyid ni //
T02TD1238E:119b-26: dbye bas lnga ru 'gro ba yin //
T02TD1238E:119b-27: bo la kakko la sbyar ba //
T02TD1238E:119b-28: reg pas sra ba'i bag chags las //
T02TD1238E:119b-29: sra ba gti mug chos nyid phyir //
T02TD1238E:119b-30: gti mug rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1238E:119b-31: gang phyir byang sems gsher ba las ;
T02TD1238E:119b-32: / gsher ba chu yi khams su 'dod //
T02TD1238E:119b-33: chu ni mi bskyod gzugs nyid phyir //
T02TD1238E:119b-35: gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02TD1238E:119b-36: drod ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:119b-37: 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin //
T02TD1238E:120a-0: @120a * // kakko lar ni gang zhig sems //
T02TD1238E:120a-1: de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1238E:120a-2: phrag dog don yod grub pa yin //
T02TD1238E:120a-5: dga' ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD1238E:120a-6: nam mkha' ser sna rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:120a-7: ser sna nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
T02TD1238E:120a-8: sems ni chen po gcig nyid la //
T02TD1238E:120a-9: lnga yi gzugs kyis mtshon pa yin //
T02TD1238E:120a-10: rigs ni lnga po de nyid las //
T02TD1238E:120a-11: stong phrag du ma skyes pa nyid //
T02TD1238E:120a-12: de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig / bde chen mchog tu phan pa nyid //
T02TD1238E:120a-13: 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yi //
T02TD1238E:120a-15: de nas yang khams dang phung po dang yul la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa ste ngo bo nyid kyis gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o //
T02TD1238E:120a-16: kye rdo rjer yang gsungs te /
T02TD1238E:120a-17: rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa //
T02TD1238E:120a-18: brdzun min bden min de bzhin du //
T02TD1238E:120a-19: thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar //
T02TD1238E:120a-21: 'di lta ste gtsub shing dang gtsub stan dang skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bur du me 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1238E:120a-22: me 'di ni gtsub shing la mi gnas //
T02TD1238E:120a-23: gtsub stan la yang ma yin //
T02TD1238E:120a-24: skyes bu'i lag pa dag la yang ma yin te //
T02TD1238E:120a-25: rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na gcig na yang yod pa ma yin pas //
T02TD1238E:120a-26: me de yang bden pa yang ma yin zhing brdzun pa yang ma yin no //
T02TD1238E:120a-27: de ltar chos thams cad rnal 'byor mas yid la gyis shig / de'i phyir de rnam par dag pa na ste /
T02TD1238E:120a-28: phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad //
T02TD1238E:120a-29: rnam dag ye shes rang bzhin can //
T02TD1238E:120a-30: zhes dbang gi le'u las gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1238E:120a-32: dang por dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1238E:120a-34: dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid //
T02TD1238E:120a-35: gsum po rnams la lhan skyes med //
T02TD1238E:120a-36: 'di la man ngag gis rnam par bshad pa ni mtshan nyid med pas brdzun pa ste 'gro ba'i ye shes skye'o //
T02TD1238E:120a-37: dang po la ni de khyad par du bzung nas gsungs so //
T02TD1238E:120b-0: mchog tu dga' ba'i ye shes de ni gzung bar bya @120b ba dang 'dzin pa po'i dngos po la dmigs nas 'dzin pa'i don to //
T02TD1238E:120b-1: dga' bral gyi dga' ba yang 'di dang 'dis gsungs te /
T02TD1238E:120b-2: sems dang sems las byung ba dang ma rig pa rnams kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1238E:120b-3: byang chub kyi sems 'di ni rnal 'byor pa'i rang rig pa'i ye shas te de ni rnal 'byor pa ye shes dang ldan pa la yin na de'i tshe so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ci ltar shes par bya /
T02TD1238E:120b-4: gang du rtogs par bya ba yang yin nam zhe na /
T02TD1238E:120b-5: brjod par bya ste bla ma bsnyen bkur ba las snyoms par zhugs pa'i dga' ba'i rnam pa mngon sum du byas nas gzhan du gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams su yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:120b-6: de kye rdo rjer gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:120b-7: ae yig cha byad bzang po gang //
T02TD1238E:120b-8: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1238E:120b-9: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02TD1238E:120b-10: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / skad cig dbye bas phyed nyid las //
T02TD1238E:120b-11: dga' ba de la skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:120b-12: skad cig shes la bde shes pa //
T02TD1238E:120b-13: ae wam yi ger rab tu gnas //
T02TD1238E:120b-14: sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang //
T02TD1238E:120b-15: rnam nyid de bzhin mtshan nyid bral //
T02TD1238E:120b-16: skad cig bzhi la brten nas ni //
T02TD1238E:120b-19: sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bshad //
T02TD1238E:120b-20: rnam par smin pa de las bzlog / bde ba'i ye shes bza' ba ni //
T02TD1238E:120b-21: bdag gis bde ba zos par ni //
T02TD1238E:120b-22: lta ba rnam nyid du rab gsungs //
T02TD1238E:120b-23: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan //
T02TD1238E:120b-24: chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
T02TD1238E:120b-25: sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ba ste //
T02TD1238E:120b-26: rnam smin la ni mchog dga'o //
T02TD1238E:120b-27: rnam nyid la ni dga' bral dga' //
T02TD1238E:120b-28: lhan cig skyes dga' mtshan bral la'o //
T02TD1238E:120b-29: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
T02TD1238E:120b-30: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1238E:120b-31: dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni //
T02TD1238E:120b-32: dga' ba la sogs rim shes bya //
T02TD1238E:120b-33: dgod pa dag pa slob dpon te //
T02TD1238E:120b-34: lta ba gsang ba de bzhin no //
T02TD1238E:120b-35: lag bcangs la ni shes rab nyid //
T02TD1238E:120b-36: gnyis gnyis 'khyud la de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1238E:120b-37: sems can rnams kyi dngos grub phyir //
T02TD1238E:120b-38: dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad //
T02TD1238E:120b-39: gtor dang bkrus pa zhes bya 'dis //
T02TD1238E:121a-0: @121a * // de yis dbang zhes brjod par bya //
T02TD1238E:121a-1: da ni dga' ba la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1238E:121a-2: dang po reg par 'dod pa dang //
T02TD1238E:121a-3: gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa dang //
T02TD1238E:121a-5: bzhi pa'ang bsgom par bya ba min //
T02TD1238E:121a-7: dga' bas bde ba cung zad de //
T02TD1238E:121a-8: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / dga' bral dga' ba chags bral 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:121a-9: lhag mas lhan cig skyes dga'o //
T02TD1238E:121a-10: de ltar ni 'phags pa lha'i zhabs kyis /
T02TD1238E:121a-11: ae ma bde ba ae ma'o bde //
T02TD1238E:121a-12: ji lta ji ltar za ba na //
T02TD1238E:121a-13: sems ni mchog tu 'dod pa ste //
T02TD1238E:121a-14: dga' bral dga' ba tsam yin no //
T02TD1238E:121a-15: 'dis 'di gsungs par gyur pa yin te //
T02TD1238E:121a-16: ma rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs kyi mtshan nyid dga' bral gyi dga' ba la nye bar dmigs pa gang yin pa'i bde ba nyid kyis cung zad grib ma'i rjes su byed pa'i dpe'i bde ba des mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'chang zhing dpe byad brgyad cus brgyan pa ji ltar me long gi nang du ri mo'i rnam pa nye bar dmigs pa de bzhin nyid du mngon du byed pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i ye shes su rdo rje bla ma'i zhal las rig par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:121a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:121a-18: ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T02TD1238E:121a-19: khyab bdag dpe byad brgyad cur ldan //
T02TD1238E:121a-20: de ltar yang klu sgrub zhabs kyis //
T02TD1238E:121a-21: me long dri ma med par ni //
T02TD1238E:121a-22: gzugs brnyan gsal bar blta bya zhing //
T02TD1238E:121a-23: dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba //
T02TD1238E:121a-24: shin tu bkri ba'i rdo rje sems //
T02TD1238E:121a-25: bla ma bzang la brten bya ste //
T02TD1238E:121a-26: bdag byin brlabs su de brjod bya //
T02TD1238E:121a-27: de ltar ni 'phags pa lha'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs la /
T02TD1238E:121a-28: de yang dz'a landha ri pa'i zhabs kyis rgya 'grel rdo rje sgron mar bris pa 'di lta ste /
T02TD1238E:121a-29: ji ltar shin tu dang pa'i me long la //
T02TD1238E:121a-30: gzugs brnyan yan lag kun ldan gzugs su snang //
T02TD1238E:121a-31: de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad brgyad cu yis //
T02TD1238E:121a-32: phyug pa'i rdo rje 'chang sku rtag pa nyid //
T02TD1238E:121a-33: ces pa bdag byin gyis brlab pa ste rim pa gsum pa'o /
T02TD1238E:121a-35: // / da ni rnam par dag pa'i rim pa brjod par bya ste slar yang phreng ba dang chu la sogs pa'i dbang gi rim gyis /
T02TD1238E:121a-36: mthe bong srin lag dag gis de //
T02TD1238E:121b-0: slob @121b ma'i khar ni ltung bar bya //
T02TD1238E:121b-1: zhes pa 'dis gsang ba la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba byin nas gsum pa khyad par gyi dga' bas byin gyis brlab pa'i dga' ba'i rnam pa rtogs par byas te /
T02TD1238E:121b-2: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1238E:121b-3: zhes pa 'dis de'i rnam par dag pa ni med par dgag pa'i 'jug pas de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te gzugs dang gzugs ma yin pa'i phung po la sogs pa rnams kyi lha'i rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1238E:121b-4: gzhan ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs rang rig pa'i bdag nyid can gzung bar bya ba la sogs pa'i gnyen po dga' ba gsum po bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa gang gi rnam par dag pa ste de bzhin nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rang bzhin no //
T02TD1238E:121b-5: de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:121b-6: dngos por grags pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD1238E:121b-7: rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod //
T02TD1238E:121b-8: phyi nas re re'i dbye bas de //
T02TD1238E:121b-9: lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1238E:121b-11: phung po lnga dang dbang po drug / skye mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga'i //
T02TD1238E:121b-12: mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam dag / mi shes nyon mongs sgrib sbyang bya //
T02TD1238E:121b-13: rang rig bdag nyid dag pa ste //
T02TD1238E:121b-14: dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min //
T02TD1238E:121b-15: yul rnams dag pa'i dngos nyid phyir //
T02TD1238E:121b-16: bde ba mchog ni rang rig pa'o //
T02TD1238E:121b-17: 'dis 'di gsungs pa yin te bskyed pa'i rim pa la brten nas lha mo rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams rnam par dag par gsungs so //
T02TD1238E:121b-18: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'i dga' ba gsum po rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni rang rig pa'i bdag nyid can de bzhin de las rab tu zhugs pa zhes pa'i don te 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad stong par gsungs so //
T02TD1238E:121b-19: de kho na nyid kyi le'u yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:121b-20: dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //
T02TD1238E:121b-23: ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba med //
T02TD1238E:121b-24: sgra med thos pa po yang med //
T02TD1238E:121b-25: dri med snom pa po yang med //
T02TD1238E:121b-26: ro med myong ba po yang med //
T02TD1238E:121b-27: sems med sems las byung ba med //
T02TD1238E:121b-28: dbang gi le'ur yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:122a-0: mchog dga' bsgom pa med cing @122a * //
T02TD1238E:122a-2: lus kyang med cing gzung ba med cing 'dzin pa'ang med //
T02TD1238E:122a-3: sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshad dang lci ba'ang med //
T02TD1238E:122a-4: skyug khro rmongs med gtsang sbra mchod phyir thogs med dang //
T02TD1238E:122a-5: chags med sdang ba med dang rmongs med phrag dog med //
T02TD1238E:122a-6: ser sna med dang nga rgyal med cing mthong bya med //
T02TD1238E:122a-7: bsgom dang sgom po med cing bshes dang dgra med cing //
T02TD1238E:122a-8: khrem gnyer med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa sna tshogs nyid //
T02TD1238E:122a-9: 'di yang ci ltar shes par bya zhe na /
T02TD1238E:122a-11: gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1238E:122a-12: gang las kyang ni mi rnyed de //
T02TD1238E:122a-13: bla ma brgyud pa nyer bsnyen dang //
T02TD1238E:122a-14: rang la bsod nams las shes bya //
T02TD1238E:122a-15: de lta na yang lhan cig skyes pa la gang du yid ches /
T02TD1238E:122a-17: snyoms par zhugs pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma'i rjes su byed pa nyid kyi phyir bla ma'i man ngag las lhan cig skyes pa shes par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:122a-18: de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:122a-19: de la de nyid bstan par bya /
T02TD1238E:122a-20: mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can //
T02TD1238E:122a-22: gang gi dang po dga' bral yin pa de ni dga' bral dang po ste lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02TD1238E:122a-23: mthar byed do zhes pa ni mtha' can no ;
T02TD1238E:122a-24: / mchog ni rab kyi mtha' ba ste de ni de lta bu yin no //
T02TD1238E:122a-25: dga' bral dang po yang yin la mchog mtha' can yang yin pa de ni dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can no //
T02TD1238E:122a-26: rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ste //
T02TD1238E:122a-27: mtha' yi mtha' ni rab tu gsal //
T02TD1238E:122a-28: rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas //
T02TD1238E:122a-29: de la lha mo des zhus pa //
T02TD1238E:122a-30: lha de'i skad cig ji ltar lags //
T02TD1238E:122a-31: gtso bo chen po bshad du gsol //
T02TD1238E:122a-32: der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med //
T02TD1238E:122a-33: srid med mya ngan 'das pa med //
T02TD1238E:122a-34: bdag med gzhan ni med pa ste //
T02TD1238E:122a-36: ji ltar dbang bskur gsol gdab pa'i//
T02TD1238E:122a-37: slob ma'i bya ba bshad par bya //
T02TD1238E:122a-38: bla ma phyag rgya ldan mthong nas //
T02TD1238E:122a-39: brtul zhugs can gyis bstod mchod bya //
T02TD1238E:122a-40: bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye //
T02TD1238E:122a-41: rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig tu brtson //
T02TD1238E:122a-42: sgrub po phyag rgya tha mi dad //
T02TD1238E:122a-43: rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba //
T02TD1238E:122a-44: ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che //
T02TD1238E:122b-0: bya ba bdag la'ang @122b de mdzod cig /'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs nang du //
T02TD1238E:122b-1: bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs //
T02TD1238E:122b-2: zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang //
T02TD1238E:122b-3: ba la che mchog ma da na //
T02TD1238E:122b-4: bdug pa lha bshos phreng ba dang //
T02TD1238E:122b-5: dril bu rgyal mtshan byug pa ste //
T02TD1238E:122b-6: slob ma dam pas rdo rje'i 'dzin //
T02TD1238E:122b-7: mchod pa 'di rnams kyis mchod do //
T02TD1238E:122b-8: mchod pa'i bar med par ston pa pos /
T02TD1238E:122b-9: 'dis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba khong du chud par bya ste //
T02TD1238E:122b-10: gang phyir yid kyis mi bsgom par //
T02TD1238E:122b-11: 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya //
T02TD1238E:122b-12: thams cad chos ni yongs shes na //
T02TD1238E:122b-13: bsgom pa nyid ni bsgom pa min //
T02TD1238E:122b-14: 'di dang 'di ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba rnams kyi yang de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1238E:122b-16: thams cad thams cad stong pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1238E:122b-17: de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:122b-18: brtan dang g-yo ba'i dngos po gang //
T02TD1238E:122b-19: rtsa lcug 'khri shing la sogs rnams //
T02TD1238E:122b-20: bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD1238E:122b-21: dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya //
T02TD1238E:122b-22: de rnams gcig pu gzhan yod min //
T02TD1238E:122b-23: bde ba chen po rang rig pa'o //
T02TD1238E:122b-24: mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob //
T02TD1238E:122b-25: sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la //
T02TD1238E:122b-26: ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che //
T02TD1238E:122b-27: bde ba chen po gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1238E:122b-28: de ltar yang 'phags pa lha'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:122b-29: dga' ba la sogs rim pas phra mo la //
T02TD1238E:122b-30: dmigs pa la ni brten nas skad cig ma //
T02TD1238E:122b-31: zad par 'gyur ba bzhi pa'i dus su ni //
T02TD1238E:122b-32: ae ma dmigs pa zhes bya ci zhig yin //
T02TD1238E:122b-33: gang yang khrem gnyer med pa'i bde ba ni //
T02TD1238E:122b-34: myong ba'i rnam par gzhal bar bya ba tsam //
T02TD1238E:122b-35: de yang 'jigs pa yang ste de la ni //
T02TD1238E:122b-36: rnam par bsgyings pa 'ba' zhig dmigs pa med //
T02TD1238E:122b-37: ae ma'o srid gsum gang ba yi //
T02TD1238E:122b-38: bde ba chen po sgeg pa ste //
T02TD1238E:122b-39: gang gis rang dang gzhan gyi char //
T02TD1238E:122b-40: rnam dbyer med pa'i skad cig go //
T02TD1238E:122b-41: 'dis 'di gsungs par gyur pa yin te /
T02TD1238E:122b-42: gsum pa dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i dpe las //
T02TD1238E:122b-43: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i bde ba 'byung ba nyid du rtogs par byas nas de nyid rnam par dag pa las de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pas lhan cig skyes par rtogs par bya ba yin no //
T02TD1238E:122b-45: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1238E:123a-2: / snyoms par 'jug pa yod na ye shes gang yin pa thog mar gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1238E:123a-3: de bzhin du 'dir yang lhan cig skyes pa rtogs pa las de ni de yang bzhi pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ba des na lhan cig skyes pa byang chub kyi sems kyi dpe las bde ba gang yin pa dang ye shes gang yin pa la yid ches par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:123a-4: lhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma'i rjes su byed pa nyid kyi phyir de ni de kho nyid du bshad pa ma yin gyi 'byung ba chen po pa'o //
T02TD1238E:123a-5: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang //
T02TD1238E:123a-6: gang phyir 'khyud pa che bde ba //
T02TD1238E:123a-7: de phyir bde ba de nyid min //
T02TD1238E:123a-9: 'di nyid slob ma'i dri ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1238E:123a-10: dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa //
T02TD1238E:123a-11: byang chub sems ni ltung gyur na //
T02TD1238E:123a-12: phung po rnam shes brgyal 'gyur bas //
T02TD1238E:123a-13: ma smad dngos grub ga la yod //
T02TD1238E:123a-14: mkha' dbyings rdo rje yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1238E:123a-15: reg las rmad byung chen po yi //
T02TD1238E:123a-16: bde ba skye ba gang yin pa //
T02TD1238E:123a-17: de ni mchog dga'i byed po'o //
T02TD1238E:123a-19: ma smad dngos grub ga la yod //
T02TD1238E:123a-20: ces pa ni de nyid mchog tu dga' bar bshad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba las phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos grub po //
T02TD1238E:123a-21: dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir na ma smad pa ste de'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa khong du chud pa'o //
T02TD1238E:123a-22: phung po la sogs pa brgyal ba de yod na ye shes gang rjes su myong ba yin /
T02TD1238E:123a-23: des na bdag byin gyis brlab par ma dag par byas so //
T02TD1238E:123a-24: de bsgom pa rab kyi mthar son pa na ste ji srid du phung po la sogs pa med par ma gyur pa de srid du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub mngon sum du byed par mi nus so //
T02TD1238E:123a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:123a-26: mchog tu bde ba phung po med /
T02TD1238E:123a-28: 'di nyid kyang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis 'chi bar mngon par brjod de /
T02TD1238E:123a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:123a-30: ji ltar pha las bde thob pa //
T02TD1238E:123a-31: de yi bde ba rang gis bzang //
T02TD1238E:123a-32: bde ba gang gis 'chi ba ste //
T02TD1238E:123a-33: de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod //
T02TD1238E:123a-34: 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog ni //
T02TD1238E:123a-35: zhes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs par rgyas par ro //
T02TD1238E:123a-36: mang du smra bas ci zhig bya //
T02TD1238E:123a-37: rdo rje theg pa'i de nyid las //
T02TD1238E:123a-38: rdzas kyi dngos por yod ces pa'ang //
T02TD1238E:123b-0: rang bzhin rten nas de @123b nyid do ;
T02TD1238E:123b-1: / brtags pa'i dngos po med pa ste //
T02TD1238E:123b-2: gzhan gyi dbang ni yod pa yin //
T02TD1238E:123b-3: zhes pa ste de la sogs pa'i sgras gzhan gyi dbang bzung ngo //
T02TD1238E:123b-4: rgyu gzhan la brten pas na gzhan gyi dbang dang grub pa yin no //
T02TD1238E:123b-5: gzhan gyi dbang ni 'gro ba'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid do//
T02TD1238E:123b-6: de dag gi dngos po med pa ni yongs su grub pa'i gzugs lhan cig skyes par bshad pa mya ngan las 'das par yang gsungs te thams cad kyi thams cad du thams cad stong pa ni mu stegs pa rnams kyi cha shas yin no //
T02TD1238E:123b-7: de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed par mdzad ma'o zhes pa rnam par dag pa ste rim pa bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1238E:123b-9: // / da ni rnam par dag pa las ldang ba'i rim pa rab tu bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1238E:123b-11: ldang ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid med pa yin pa'i phyir ci lta ba de ni su zhig gi yin par 'gyur zhe na brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1238E:123b-12: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid med pa ni skyes pa ma yin gyi gang zhig bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bsgoms pa las ji srid 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed pa de srid du ldang ba ste skyed par ni mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1238E:123b-14: phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad //
T02TD1238E:123b-15: rnam dag ye shes rang bzhin can //
T02TD1238E:123b-17: phyi nas zhes pa ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i de ma thag tu rang rig pa las skyes pa ni dngos grub po //
T02TD1238E:123b-19: rang rig las ni dngos grub 'gyur ;
T02TD1238E:123b-20: / rang rig phyir na bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1238E:123b-23: phyag rgya rgyu dang sbyor bral las //
T02TD1238E:123b-25: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02TD1238E:123b-26: byang chub sems su brjod pa yin //
T02TD1238E:123b-27: 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis zung du 'jug pa ni lam dang zung du 'jug pa ni 'bras bur gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1238E:123b-29: rang rig ye shes de nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:123b-30: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
T02TD1238E:123b-31: mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid //
T02TD1238E:123b-32: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres //
T02TD1238E:124a-2: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog //
T02TD1238E:124a-3: de nyid mi 'gyur ba ma yin //
T02TD1238E:124a-4: de nyid thams cad bya ba po //
T02TD1238E:124a-5: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD1238E:124a-8: dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //
T02TD1238E:124a-9: de bzhin slar yang byon pa nyid //
T02TD1238E:124a-10: 'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis //
T02TD1238E:124a-11: de bzhin gshegs par mngon brjod bya //
T02TD1238E:124a-12: de la rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02TD1238E:124a-13: thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bgyi ba lags /
T02TD1238E:124a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1238E:124a-16: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pas kyang //
T02TD1238E:124a-17: kun rdzob don dam gzugs can gyi //
T02TD1238E:124a-18: byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed //
T02TD1238E:124a-19: kun rdzob kunda lta bu ste //
T02TD1238E:124a-20: don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no //
T02TD1238E:124a-21: bud med kko la bde ba can //
T02TD1238E:124a-22: ae wam yi ge'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD1238E:124a-23: bde ba srung ba nyid kyi phyir //
T02TD1238E:124a-24: bde ba can zhes brjod par bya //
T02TD1238E:124a-25: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1238E:124a-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas //
T02TD1238E:124a-29: 'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni //
T02TD1238E:124a-31: 'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs //
T02TD1238E:124a-32: 'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa //
T02TD1238E:124a-33: 'khor ba dbang po rnams nyid de //
T02TD1238E:124a-34: 'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa //
T02TD1238E:124a-36: rmongs phyir 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid //
T02TD1238E:124a-37: rmongs med 'khor ba dag pas ni //
T02TD1238E:124a-39: /'dis chos 'di rnams kyi rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mkhyen pa las rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis bdag nyid kyi skye ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1238E:124a-40: gal te gzhan rnams kyis bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas rang bzhin yongs su shes par 'gyur zhing so so'i skye bo rnams kyi yin pa de'i tshe de rnams kyi bdag nyid 'ba' zhig pa yang ma yin no //
T02TD1238E:124a-41: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1238E:124a-42: ma lus pa yi sems can gyi //
T02TD1238E:124a-43: skye ba gang la brjod bya ba //
T02TD1238E:124a-44: gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir //
T02TD1238E:124a-45: de la sprul pa'i sku nyid yin //
T02TD1238E:124b-0: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas @124b par te //
T02TD1238E:124b-1: sde pa sde ma zhes bshad pa //
T02TD1238E:124b-2: lto ba gnas su brjod par bya //
T02TD1238E:124b-4: mngal gyi khru ma chos gos yin //
T02TD1238E:124b-5: de bzhin ma ni mkhan po'o //
T02TD1238E:124b-6: mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag /'gro ba'i bya ba bslab pa'i gnas //
T02TD1238E:124b-7: de bzhin sngags bzlas aa dang ham //
T02TD1238E:124b-8: skye gnas 'khor lo'i yi ge aa //
T02TD1238E:124b-9: bde chen gyi yang yi ge ham //
T02TD1238E:124b-10: gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs //
T02TD1238E:124b-11: sngags bzlas kyang ni dge slong skyes //
T02TD1238E:124b-12: tshogs pa 'di rnams kyis sems can //
T02TD1238E:124b-13: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //
T02TD1238E:124b-14: zla ba bcu yang sa rnams yin //
T02TD1238E:124b-15: sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go //
T02TD1238E:124b-16: 'di nyid ye shes chen po ste //
T02TD1238E:124b-17: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD1238E:124b-18: gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul //
T02TD1238E:124b-19: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso //
T02TD1238E:124b-20: brtan dang g-yo ba khyab nas gnas //
T02TD1238E:124b-21: sgyu ma'i gzugs can nyid du snang //
T02TD1238E:124b-24: lus la ye shes chen po gnas //
T02TD1238E:124b-25: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02TD1238E:124b-26: dngos po kun la khyab byed pa //
T02TD1238E:124b-27: lus la gnas kyang lus skyes min //
T02TD1238E:124b-28: de'i phyir bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i de bzhin nyid la rab tu zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu skyes pa'i rim pa shes par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du 'khor ba zad pa tsam kho nar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1238E:124b-29: 'khor bar gnas pa'i bar du yang dam pa'i don yang dag par rtogs pa'i thabs dang /
T02TD1238E:124b-30: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis thob par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T02TD1238E:124b-32: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyi //
T02TD1238E:124b-33: brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa bsgom //
T02TD1238E:124b-34: spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas //
T02TD1238E:124b-35: spros pa nyid ni spros med bya //
T02TD1238E:124b-36: sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ni //
T02TD1238E:124b-37: ji ltar bar ma'i srid ji bzhin //
T02TD1238E:124b-38: rtag tu goms pa'i skyong ba las //
T02TD1238E:124b-39: de lta bu nyid dkyil 'khor snang //
T02TD1238E:124b-40: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1238E:124b-41: ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po //
T02TD1238E:124b-42: 'di nyid de myong ba las te //
T02TD1238E:125a-0: phung po rnams nyid dri ma med pa'i @125a * //
T02TD1238E:125a-2: thams cad lha mo mang por rnam par nges shing rtogs //
T02TD1238E:125a-3: dpa' bo he ru ka yang yin pa ste //
T02TD1238E:125a-4: 'dzag med sku ste de bzhin nyid kyi ro yin no //
T02TD1238E:125a-5: kye rdo rje'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa //
T02TD1238E:125a-6: bde ba nag po bde ba ser //
T02TD1238E:125a-7: bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar ;
T02TD1238E:125a-8: / bde ba sngon po bde ba ljang //
T02TD1238E:125a-9: bde ba nag po rgyu mi rgyu //
T02TD1238E:125a-10: bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs //
T02TD1238E:125a-11: de bzhin kun du ru skyes bde //
T02TD1238E:125a-12: bde ba dngos dang dngos med pa //
T02TD1238E:125a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod //
T02TD1238E:125a-14: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02TD1238E:125a-16: de yi bde ba bde chen 'dod //
T02TD1238E:125a-17: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa yi //
T02TD1238E:125a-18: bskyed pas dgos pa ci zhig yod //
T02TD1238E:125a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
T02TD1238E:125a-20: ae ma byang chub sems chen 'di //
T02TD1238E:125a-21: dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyon //
T02TD1238E:125a-22: lus ni dngos med gang las bde //
T02TD1238E:125a-23: bde bar smra bar mi nus so//
T02TD1238E:125a-24: khyab bya khyab byed tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1238E:125a-25: bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa yin //
T02TD1238E:125a-26: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
T02TD1238E:125a-27: me tog med phyir shes mi 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:125a-28: de bzhin gzugs la sogs med pas //
T02TD1238E:125a-29: bde ba dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:125a-30: dngos pa dngos po med pa nga //
T02TD1238E:125a-31: dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga //
T02TD1238E:125a-32: gang zhig le los nyer 'tshe dang //
T02TD1238E:125a-33: rmongs pa gang gis bdag mi shes //
T02TD1238E:125a-34: rje btsun lha mo'i bha gar ni //
T02TD1238E:125a-35: ae yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs //
T02TD1238E:125a-36: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / bde ba can du rtag tu rgyu //
T02TD1238E:125a-37: 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
T02TD1238E:125a-38: rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga //
T02TD1238E:125a-39: bsgrub bya 'gro ba'i ston pa nga //
T02TD1238E:125a-41: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga //
T02TD1238E:125a-42: mchog mtha' dga' bral dad po can //
T02TD1238E:125a-43: mun pa la ni mar me ltar //
T02TD1238E:125a-44: de bzhin bus kyang yid ches gyis //
T02TD1238E:125a-45: ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T02TD1238E:125a-46: btsun mo'i bha ga bde can du //
T02TD1238E:125a-47: khu ba'i ming gis rnam par gnas //
T02TD1238E:125a-48: gsungs pa'i rim pa 'di gnyis kyis //
T02TD1238E:125a-49: sngags rgyud sogs dang rnal 'byor la //
T02TD1238E:125a-50: gang gis he ru ka mi shes //
T02TD1238E:125a-51: de yis log par ngal ba'o //
T02TD1238E:125a-52: de med pas na bde med 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:125a-53: bde ba med na de med 'gyur //
T02TD1238E:125a-54: nus med nyid phyir ltos bcas te //
T02TD1238E:125b-1: gang phyir lus las byung bas na //
T02TD1238E:125b-2: lha zhes brjod par bya ba yin //
T02TD1238E:125b-3: de phyir sangs rgyas dngos 'gyur min //
T02TD1238E:125b-4: dngos med tshul du'ang 'gyur nyid min //
T02TD1238E:125b-5: zhal phyag rnam pa gzugs can te /
T02TD1238E:125b-6: mchog tu bde bas gzugs med pa //
T02TD1238E:125b-7: de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1238E:125b-8: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes brjod bya //
T02TD1238E:125b-9: rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1238E:125b-10: rang bzhin nyid ni mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1238E:125b-11: bzhin lag kha dog dbyibs las ni //
T02TD1238E:125b-12: lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
T02TD1238E:125b-13: skye ba tsam gyis rnam par gnas //
T02TD1238E:125b-14: 'on kyang tha mal bag chags las //
T02TD1238E:125b-15: de'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lus med pas grol ba ma yin te /
T02TD1238E:125b-16: de ni gang du yang 'dod par bya ba ma yin no //
T02TD1238E:125b-17: thams cad du stong pa nyid las lhan cig skyes pa bshad pa dngos pos grol ba de yang ma yin no //
T02TD1238E:125b-18: de'i phyir yang de dag gi rnam par grol ba ni stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1238E:125b-19: snying rje dbyer med pa'i mthar thug pa'i gzugs byang chub kyi sems ma yin no zhes bya bar nges so //
T02TD1238E:125b-20: de ltar yang klu sgrub zhabs kyis //
T02TD1238E:125b-21: dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol bya //
T02TD1238E:125b-22: dngos po med pas 'gyur ba min //
T02TD1238E:125b-23: dngos po'i bdag nyid rnam grol te //
T02TD1238E:125b-24: dngos dang dngos med yongs shes pas //
T02TD1238E:125b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rgyud du gsungs pa //
T02TD1238E:125b-26: rdo rje snying po snying rje che //
T02TD1238E:125b-27: dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing //
T02TD1238E:125b-29: de yongs shes pas grol ba yin //
T02TD1238E:125b-30: dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas //
T02TD1238E:125b-31: dngos po bsgom 'gyur shes rab can //
T02TD1238E:125b-32: dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas //
T02TD1238E:125b-33: he ru ka dpal de ltar bsgom //
T02TD1238E:125b-35: shr'i yig gnyis med ye shes te //
T02TD1238E:125b-36: de ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02TD1238E:125b-37: ru yig bkod pa dang bral ba //
T02TD1238E:125b-38: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
T02TD1238E:125b-39: de ltar shes nas rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1238E:125b-40: gang zhig mnyam gzhag sgom byed pa //
T02TD1238E:125b-41: bsod nams zhan pa'i mi yis kyang //
T02TD1238E:125b-42: the tshom med par de 'grub po //
T02TD1238E:125b-43: mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor yang rnal 'byor tha ma'i'o //
T02TD1238E:125b-44: bza' dang btung dang khrus byed dang //
T02TD1238E:125b-45: sad dam nyams yang bsam par bya //
T02TD1238E:125b-46: phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas //
T02TD1238E:126a-1: par gzhag pa 'di ni rnal 'byor ma 'bring po'i yin no //
T02TD1238E:126a-2: chen po'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis //
T02TD1238E:126a-3: bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang //
T02TD1238E:126a-4: bgrod dang bgrod min mi spang zhing //
T02TD1238E:126a-5: khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste //
T02TD1238E:126a-6: grong gi chos ni spang mi bya //
T02TD1238E:126a-7: blo ldan sngags bzla ba nyid min //
T02TD1238E:126a-8: bsam gtan dmigs par bya nyid min //
T02TD1238E:126a-9: gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste //
T02TD1238E:126a-10: dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go //
T02TD1238E:126a-11: ba la thams cad bza' bar bya //
T02TD1238E:126a-12: rigs rnams la ni mnyam par spyad //
T02TD1238E:126a-13: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1238E:126a-14: btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya //
T02TD1238E:126a-15: grogs la dga' bar mi bya zhing ;
T02TD1238E:126a-16: / de bzhin gdug la zhe sdang min //
T02TD1238E:126a-17: rdo shing sa las byung ba yi //
T02TD1238E:126a-18: lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya //
T02TD1238E:126a-19: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par ro //
T02TD1238E:126a-21: sngags kyi bzlas med dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med //
T02TD1238E:126a-22: dkyil 'khor ba med dkyil 'khor yang ni med pa ste //
T02TD1238E:126a-23: de ni sngags bzlas dka' thub de yin sbyin sreg de //
T02TD1238E:126a-24: de ni dkyil 'khor pa ste dkyil 'khor yang ni de //
T02TD1238E:126a-25: mdor bsdus nas ni sems su 'dus pa'i gzugs can no //
T02TD1238E:126a-27: ji ltar dpa' bo rtog med pas //
T02TD1238E:126a-28: 'jig rten pa yi gnas bcom nas //
T02TD1238E:126a-29: spyod pa thams cad spyad par bya //
T02TD1238E:126a-30: de tshe de yis sangs rgyas mthong //
T02TD1238E:126a-32: dpal ldan he ru ka yis rgyud kyi rgyal por gsungs pa'i bla med rim pa lnga //
T02TD1238E:126a-33: dpal ldan dz'a lan dha ri bzang po'i zhabs kyis bkod dang bla ma'i gsang ba'i bzhed //
T02TD1238E:126a-34: de thob skal pa bzang la yang dag gzhung byas bsod nams mchog gang thob de la //
T02TD1238E:126a-35: ma lus sems can phung po'i 'gro bas bla med rim lnga nges par thob par shog //
T02TD1238E:126a-36: dpal kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal sgra gcan gsang ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so; ;
T02TD1238E:126a-37: //'di ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi dpal la brten nas dzam bus mtshan pa'i gling gi byang phyogs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po'i srid la mnga' bsgyur zhing /
T02TD1238E:126a-38: bstan pa rin po che la sri zhu dang /
T02TD1238E:126a-39: bya ba lhag par bsgrub pa'i khur gyis mi ngal ba'i chos kyi rgyal po chen po//
T02TD1238E:126b-0: @126b grags pa 'byung gnas rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos lung stsal zhing /
T02TD1238E:126b-2: rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta chen po shr'i ba na ratna zhabs kyi zhal snga nas dang /
T02TD1238E:126b-3: bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyis phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i pho brang chen po sne gdod rtse'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//
